title: The Ghost of Meriwether Manor
description: Secrets shroud a house in mystery, and a family is haunted by an eerie presence, a watcher from the wood . . . . Join seventh grader, Meriwether Knight, as she travels back to England to meet the grandparents she's never known; who up until now have never wanted to know her. What she discovers there will change her life forever.With the help of a cat, a boy, a diary, and a talisman, Meriwether uncovers a lie and the truth about herself.
author: Emily J. Beaver
